description: This copy, containing the first half of the commentary, lacks 5 kurrāsahs at the beginning. ff. 140. 232 x 164; 157 x 102 mm. 21 lin. 14th cen. Commentary on Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 372 (commentary 1); S I, 537.
author: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-ḥillī, al-ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325
title: Ghāyat al-wuṣūl wa-īḍāḥ al-subul
creator: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-ḥillī, al-ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325
subject: Ibn al-ḥājib, ʻUthmān ibn ʻUmar, 1175-1249—Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
